channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: CCPD: RPI-Only Info Table with Fast Enterprises Scheduled for October 1
item.description: From 10:30AM to 12:30PM on Tuesday, October 1, students are invited to stop by the 15th Street lobby in the Rensselaer Union, and speak to representatives from Fast Enterprises to learn how to become a “FASTie,” an energetic, intelligent, enthusiastic person who works at Fast Enterprises! The company works directly with governments to implement essential software used to administer a wide range of programs, and offers commercial software that helps agencies in a variety of ways.
item.author: Students

item.title: October 2 Info Session to Highlight DoD Student Programs
item.description: Date: Wednesday, October 2, 2024 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM - Register to attend this session to learn about the Department of Defense’s SMART Scholars Program and the National Defense Science and Engineering Graduate Research Fellowship — which provide funding for undergraduate and graduate students for up to five years — as well as post-graduate opportunities to work in DoD labs.
item.author: Students

item.title: “Research Tools & Techniques” Symposium Scheduled for October 2
item.description: Date: Wednesday, October 2, 2024 2:00 PM - 5:00 PM - Discover the magic of research tools with the Graduate Student Council’s upcoming symposium in the CBIS Auditorium that will explore essential apps, workflows, and services that streamline your graduate studies and your personal life. Don’t miss this opportunity to learn, share, and connect with fellow researchers!
item.author: Students

item.title: NPZ Law Group to Hold Free Immigration Workshop
item.description: Date: Wednesday, October 9, 2024 12:00 PM - 1:30 PM - Hosted by ISSS and presented by NPZ Group (Nachman Phulwani Zimovcak (NPZ) Law Group, P.C.), this virtual workshop will feature expert immigration lawyers discussing visa options that are available after graduation, including H-1B, O-1, and much more. Please register if you plan to attend!
item.author: Students

item.title: OGE Online Workshop to Offer Tips for Dissertation, Thesis Preparation and Submission
item.description: Date: Wednesday, October 9, 2024 6:00 PM - 7:30 PM - This workshop will discuss the basics of correct thesis organization and format, appropriate paper attribution and reference citation styles, and review the most common mistakes and ways to avoid them. All students who will be writing a thesis or dissertation are welcome to register and get their questions ready!
item.author: Students

item.title: Order of the Engineer Registration Now Open
item.description: Date: Wednesday, September 25, 2024 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM - From now through October 3, all senior and graduate engineering students are invited to register to join the Order of the Engineer! Just complete the registration form and then stop by the Order’s tabling event in the 15th Street lobby of the Rensselaer Union to have your ring sized.
item.author: Students

item.title: Rensselaer at Work to Hold Mechanical Engineering Review October 2
item.description: Date: Wednesday, October 2, 2024 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Register to take part in this virtual session covering Rensselaer’s online, project-based Master of Engineering program in Mechanical Engineering. Attendees can expect to learn how professionals can develop their practice in core mechanical disciplines while being able to customize the program to fit their needs.
item.author: Students

item.title: “Revisiting ChatBS, the R-powered LLM Exploratory Sandbox” Topic of RPIrates Monthly Meeting
item.description: RPI R users are invited to the October meeting of RPIrates, the RPI R users group, which will take place at 6:00PM on Wednesday, October 2 in Amos Eaton 217. ChatBS is an accessible, R Shiny-based platform for interactive experimentation with LLMs, including GPT 4 variants and Llama3; in this session, Dr. John Erickson will review ChatBS, demo its capabilities, and highlight aspects of interest to R coders, including the development and deployment of R Shiny apps.
item.author: Students

item.title: RPI Space, Science, and Technology Day to be Held September 30
item.description: Date: Monday, September 30, 2024 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM - As part of its Bicentennial celebration, Rensselaer will be hosting RPI Space, Science and Technology Day! During the event, multiple RPI astronautics and alums who have become international leaders in the world’s space effort will address the rapid development of commercial space science and technology, highlight current RPI research in space science and technology, and celebrate the Institute’s long history in the exploration of space.

item.title: Student Health Services Debuts Gender Affirming Care Support Directory
item.description: Student Health Services has compiled a directory of local, New York state, and nationwide support resources for the transgender and gender non-conforming community.

item.title: ECSE Mercer Lecture Scheduled for October 2
item.description: Date: Wednesday, October 2, 2024 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM - Join ECSE for this Mercer Distinguished Lecture, “Uncertainty-aware modeling and control for human heterogeneity,” with speaker Meeko Oishi, Professor of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of New Mexico.

item.title: Faculty Recommendations for NSF GRFP Due October 11
item.description:
Date: Friday, October 11, 2024 5:00 PM - Rensselaer faculty should note that NSF GRFP is requiring letters of recommendation to be submitted early this year — by Friday, October 11 — although student applications are not due until October 15-18. Faculty members who are writing letters should have received an email from NSF with instructions on how to submit them, but may contact Betty Madigan with any questions.
